pageTitle: Diving Into The Sequester With Congressman Rothfus « CBS Pittsburgh
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4746=PITTSBURGH (NewsRadio 1020 KDKA) – Congress is on a naming spree when it comes to big issues. First, we had the Fiscal Cliff, and now everyone is talking about the Sequester. What exactly is the Sequester and why should we be worried?, 3731=The Sequester will take effect on March 1, if Congress doesn’t solve the issue.}
